data.description:
# PUNCH FIT -MR Edition-  A New Era of Fitness Coming This October!

PUNCH FIT is evolving! We’re bringing you **PUNCH FIT -MR Edition-**, packed with new features like MR support, new mission modes, revised and additional workouts, enhanced graphics, and more. With this upgrade, PUNCH FIT will transition to a **paid app**, but we’ll keep the price as affordable as possible. 
Please note that **free play will no longer be available**. The update is scheduled for **early October**.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031624_838498385093755_5253042940600692995_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Li1I4vCfrA4Q7kNvgEgEdn4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAh1HRrP8FhCLlShortoFBLxZeJM2DV_1dPNyFyhb5t6g&oe=66FD1F78)

--

__PUNCH FIT is the answer to your exercise needs.
Follow the example and punch and dodge for an easy and fun workout.
Learn various combinations of punches, dodges, and rushes to make your play more exhilarating and pleasant.__

## OVER 50 WORKOUTS
Enjoy a workout that suits your needs in terms of time and difficulty.
We plan to add more and more new workouts in the future.

## EXERCISE REWARDS
Exercise and earn drop points to get skin packs.
You can get over 100 skins.

## EXCITING BACKGROUND MUSIC
We have prepared a variety of background music to match your workout.
Let's get into the groove and have fun.

changelog.change_log:
*Adjusted vibration feedback to the controller when punching.
Effects, sounds, vibrations and drop points change with weak and strong punches.

*Calorie consumption display adjustment.
A mistake was made in the calorie notation at the time of results, which has been corrected.
We recommend using Quest's Move app to record calories and exercise.

*Fixed other minor bugs.

*Mixed Reality Capture by "LIV" is now supported.
https://www.liv.tv/
We look forward to seeing videos of you all playing PunchFit.

*Southpaw style play is now supported.
You can select the basic stance from the settings.

*Voice guidance has been adjusted.
Clarified straight and jab after dodge.

Enjoy,
